text: That Man from Rio () is a 1964 French Italian adventure movie directed by Philippe de Borca and starring Jean-Paul Belmondo, Françoise Dorléac, Jean Servais, Adolfo Celi, Simone Renant, Roger Dumas. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1965. ==Other websites== * *That Man from Rio at Le Film Guide * Category:1964 adventure movies Category:French adventure movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Philippe de Borca Category:Movies set in Brazil
title: That Man from Rio
